question.body: Which of the following proteins allows red blood cells to transport oxygen?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Myoglobin stores oxygen in muscle cells.
Correct. The heme group in the hemoglobin protein binds to oxygen and allows the red blood cell to transport it.
Incorrect. Alpha globulin is a plasma protein that plays a role in fat transportation.
Incorrect. Gama globulin is a plasma protein that plays a role in immune response.
